Name: Dolce Havana
Ingredients: 30 ml Light gold rum (1-3 year old molasses column)
7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Review: A bittersweet, rum-laced melange of Mediterranean fruit.
History: Adapted from a recipe created in 2000 by Fabrizio Musorella at the Library Bar in the Lanesborough Hotel, London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Dolce Havana contains 148 calories
